data.name: labelScienceRecordType.Help
data.value: Select type of the science record.

data.name: labelDescription.Help
data.value: Enter textual description for the science record.

data.name: SystemScienceRecordType_Directions.Help
data.value: The list of scientific directions within which scientific (research) activity is conducted

data.name: SystemScienceRecordType_Base.Help
data.value: Information on the scientific and research base for the implementation of scientific (research) activities

data.name: SystemScienceRecordType_Scientists.Help
data.value: Number of scientists participating in scientific (research) activities, number of peoples

data.name: SystemScienceRecordType_Students.Help
data.value: Number of students taking part in scientific (research) activities, number of peoples

data.name: SystemScienceRecordType_Monographs.Help
data.value: Number of published monographs of scientific and pedagogical workers of the educational organization in all scientific fields for the last year

data.name: SystemScienceRecordType_Articles.Help
data.value: The number of articles published and accepted for publication in publications recommended by the HAC / foreign for the publication of scientific works in the last year

data.name: SystemScienceRecordType_Articles.Value1
data.value: Number of Articles Recommended by the HAC:

data.name: SystemScienceRecordType_Patents.Help
data.value: Number of patents received for development in the last year: russian / foreign

data.name: SystemScienceRecordType_Certificates.Help
data.value: Number of certificates of registration of an intellectual property object issued for development in the last year: russian / foreign

data.name: SystemScienceRecordType_Finances.Help
data.value: The average annual volume of research funding per scientific-pedagogical worker of the organization (in the reduced to integer values of rates), thousands of rub

data.name: SystemScienceRecordType_Finances.Value1
data.value: Volume of Research Funding per Scientist:

data.name: Value.Invalid
data.value: Value must be non-negative integer or (in some cases) fixed-point number.

data.name: ScienceRecordType.Invalid
data.value: Science record of the selected type already exists.
